page.title: 15BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {THE MAYOR OF WINSFORD. David Tomlinson,is the Mayor of Winsford and the Ancient Borough of Over.Few mayors have two titles.There are two mayoral maces in Winsford. Mr Tomlinson is 35 years old. He has been in local government for 1 year.He owns a shop called Tiles and Carpets on Over Square. He said 20% of the people in Winsford are unemployed, and there is little chance of new jobs being created locally in the future. Most of the families on the Grange Estate work out side the area. He went on to say that vandalism of local property was a serious problem. Litter is also a problem. Every piece of litter collected costs the council 1p. A keep Winsford Tidy campaign will be started in autumn 1985 to educate the public on keeping the area tidy.
